basics.name: Franco David Pietrokovsky
basics.label: Backend Engineer & Data Engineer
basics.summary: ~2 years of experience in Backend Engineering. Currently living in Mar del Plata, Buenos Aires, Argentina. I've worked in different environments: from leading development teams of all kinds to improving performance and results in different projects using a large set of frameworks and tools.

work.name: Umoob
work.summary: I developed endpoints for the Umoob official API, achieving improvements in queries and implementing some new ones. Besides I've written documentation for the API using notion, since the team didn't have a proper one.

work.name: WeBookYou
work.summary: Co-developed an ETL process among other fellows, achieving better performance in Analytics Dashboards, developing an API using Django REST Framework, and finally migrating the whole database to AWS S3.

work.name: SoyHenry
work.summary: Lidered +7 teams during their final projects, achieving excelent organization and solving the different obstacles that came up during that time. Besides I supervised +100 students individually, helping them improve their tech and soft skills and became better professionals.

projects.name: Squba
projects.description: A squba-diving themed CLI to interact with your system in a custom way.

projects.name: Wordling
projects.description: Terminal game based in famous guessing game 'Wordle' that can be modified to add custom words.

projects.name: Amazing Store
projects.description: This was my final Data Science project. A Web Store was included as an extra in order to display results.

projects.name: Racing API
projects.description: RESTful API with various racing-themed endpoints.
